content.data:
[Y]Fun Signoff
[W]Stay cheerful, stay curious.
[c][m.]
[W]Fun pages are silly on purpose, but
[W]the community spirit behind them is
[W]serious.
[W]Keep sending jokes, quizzes and
[W]letters for the next run.
[c][m.]
[G]- Send ideas.
[G]- Credit contributors.
[G]- Keep it kind.
[m][m-]
[Y]BYE FOR NOW
[C]See you next issue, same loud colours.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
